# Business Domain Map

*Auto-generated by Intelligent Analyzer*

## Learning Content Domain

Handles all aspects of educational content including notebooks, sources (PDF, URL, YouTube), and AI-powered knowledge extraction with RAG.

- **Health Score**: 100%
- **Repos**: Website feed

## Study Tools Domain

Manages spaced repetition flashcards, study progress tracking, and learning optimization using the SM-2 algorithm.

- **Health Score**: 100%
- **Repos**: Website feed

## Collaboration Domain

Handles real-time collaborative study rooms with WebRTC video/audio, shared annotations, and participant management.

- **Health Score**: 100%
- **Repos**: Website feed

## User Identity Domain

Manages user authentication, authorization, and profile management through Supabase Auth integration.

- **Health Score**: 100%
- **Repos**: Website feed
